EmailTemplate.name: Solution updated to Audit status
EmailTemplate.subject: Solution# {!Solution.SolutionNumber} -Solution updated to Audit status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Solution.Approver_Name__c},
Solution #{!Solution.SolutionNumber} has entered into the Audit phase of the Knowledge Management process. Please review and update solution as required. Update Status to Content Review.
This Solution can remain in Audit status for up to 15 days, allowing time to fit the review process into your work schedule. Should the Audit date expire before the Solution is dispositioned, the status of this Solution will automatically revert to Content Review.
Search Results of a Solution Full Text Search will return a Solution in Audit status, but not a Solution in Content Review status.
Click on the below link to view details:
{!Solution.Link}
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
